sentences.sContent: It seemed unreal to be sitting and talking to someone so famous.
sentences.sCn: 和这么一位大名鼎鼎的人坐在一起谈话似乎很不真实。

synos.tran: 不真实的；假的；幻想的；虚构的

trans.tranCn: 不真实的；假的；幻想的；虚构的
trans.tranOther: an experience, situation etc that is unreal seems so strange that you think you must be imagining it
